name: Rain on Your Parade
description:
A slapstick comedy game where you play as a mischievous Cloud and rain on everyone's parade. Numerous levels with unique objectives to test your skills and deduction, each getting progressively more ridiculous. Unlock new abilities and discovering new mechanics going far beyond just raining on people! Go back and replay older levels to find new secrets and improve your score.
Rain, Thunder, Tornado, Meteor showers, and more
Ruining weddings
Raising an army of the undead
Drawing your own unique face and wearing hats
Cloud invading your favorite games and shows
One (1) angry sun
Wait this doesn't look like a cloud game, what is th-
WHAT ARE YOU DOING TO THOSE POOR DINOSAURS!?
No, Cloudy, STAPH!
That’s not very nice :(
If you're a fan of Untitled Goose Game, Donut County, or Goat Simulator, this will be right up your alley!
